author: protolambda

If anyone is interested, these are the bad deposit signatures on  schlesi: https://gist.github.com/protolambda/c146b66fb79a836d027ac8f93403ef5f

author: jgm
content: Not desparately surprising, given the moving nature of BLS.  Once we pick one and stick to it things should be a lot easier (plus if the next eth1 hardfork goes in we could do on-chain verification)
